lld_hsi2c_transreceive_params_s Struct Reference
HS I2C Driver API

lld_hsi2c_transreceive_params_t contains the transfer parameters. This is passed as an argument to lld_i2c_transReceive() API. More...

#include <lld_hsi2c.h>

Data Fields

Detailed Description

lld_hsi2c_transreceive_params_t contains the transfer parameters. This is passed as an argument to lld_i2c_transReceive() API.

Field Documentation

uint32_t lld_hsi2c_transreceive_params_s::flags

Flags to indicate the various modes of operation

uint32_t lld_hsi2c_transreceive_params_s::processedRxBufLen

Processed received Buffer length. Driver will update this parameter and it will be reset at the start of a transaction.

uint32_t lld_hsi2c_transreceive_params_s::processedTxBufLen

Processed transmit Buffer length. Driver will update this parameter and it will be reset at the start of a transaction.

uint8_t* lld_hsi2c_transreceive_params_s::rxBuffer

Address of the receive buffer

uint32_t lld_hsi2c_transreceive_params_s::rxBufLen

Expected length of Receive buffer in bytes. This is the length of the receive buffer pointed by rxBuffer

uint8_t lld_hsi2c_transreceive_params_s::slaveAddr

Address of the slave to talk to, not valid in Slave mode. Kept for future use if the trans receive API is extended for master mode also.

uint32_t lld_hsi2c_transreceive_params_s::timeout

Timeout value

int32_t lld_hsi2c_transreceive_params_s::transferStatus

Transfer Status. Driver will update the status. If the buffer is updated by the applicaiton after restart, The status should be updated accordingly to intimate the driver.

uint8_t* lld_hsi2c_transreceive_params_s::txBuffer

Address of the transmit buffer

uint32_t lld_hsi2c_transreceive_params_s::txBufLen

Expected length of transmit buffer in bytes. This is the length of the transmit buffer pointed by txBuffer

lldHsi2cTransreceiveRestartCallback lld_hsi2c_transreceive_params_s::txRxRestartCb

Callback function for getting the restart condition. This will be intermediate completion. If application wants to update the buffer this function will be used. If this is NULL lib will call the completion callback lldHsi2cAppCallback and new transfer should be issued after restart to continue the transfer.
